__e: It's quiet. It's peaceful. And all of a sudden, it's a gear shift inside you.
The difference is that I can take a deep breath... and look the other way every time you cross me on this ship... and you can't.
But I think digging down deep and seeing what you're truly made of is what really counts.
But once I realized it was real, something deep in my heart told me this was meant to be.
And whatever it costs for me to be able to do this... I know in my heart that it is worth it.
Then people would see what was at the bottom of everything.
